Rooms.Name: On the Roof of the Garage
A Play Area in the Crawl-space
A Play Area in the Crawl-space
On the Tip of a Hill
On the Tip of a Hill

Objects.Name: tall hibiscus plant
Objects.Description: A tall hibiscus plant stands proudly in a large china vase.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This regal looking plant is in fantastic shape, beautiful emerald greenleaves splaying widely in pleasing contrast to the bright magenta petals of theblooming flowers.  A sweet scent surrounds them, soft yellow pollen sparkling asit catches the light.

Objects.Name: pram lacey doll's
Objects.Description: A lacey doll's pram stands against the corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This rather expensive looking toy has been decorated liberally with finesatin material and delicate purple lace.  White glossy paint covers the entireframe, tiny smudged handprints darkening the handle.

Objects.Name: machine washing
Objects.Description: A washing machine rumbles steadily as it spins.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Simple yet most effective, this smooth white appliance vibrates gently as itgoes about the important business of cleaning soiled clothing.

Objects.Name: cloth nappy dingy white piece
Objects.Description: A dingy white piece of cloth lies crumpled on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This triangular piece of fabric is obviously meant to be folded for use as ababy's nappy.  Although it is washable and reusable, something about the grungycolor of the cloth makes it look as though it would be better thrown away.

Objects.Name: tiny blue sundress dress little pretty
Objects.Description: A pretty little sundress lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: tiny blue sundress dress little pretty
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pretty little thing is obviously meant for a child, baby blue materialfloating lightly in a ruffled skirt, the elasticated torso decorated with littleflowers and designed so that there is no need for straps.

Objects.Name: eye
Objects.Description: A large eye sits unblinking here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large eerie eye has a strange shimmering glow to it.  Smooth like glassand cold like frost, the staring lidless pupil is infinitely dark as though theopening to oblivion itself.  Around it, the vivid blue iris provides a startlingcontrast, drawing attention back to the fact that this looks to be a veryrealistic eyeball indeed.  A strange shimmering cover of darkness envelops theentire eye, making it possible for a holder to 'open' or 'close' it.

Objects.Name: dollhouse house dollshouse
Objects.ShortDescription: an old and magnificent wooden dollhouse
Objects.Description: An old and magnificent wooden dollhouse stands prominently displayed.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This intricately fashioned dollhouse looks to be many years old, a thin layerof dust coating its nonetheless exceptionally beautiful wooden structure.There are many rooms to this house, some bright and large whilst others aredarker and drearier, here cobwebs flutter in the corner, and here gloriousminiature paintings decorate a grand display room.  There are three levels tothe house, and each seems rather peculiarly to be an independantly designedstructure of its own.  Tiny pieces of furniture are scattered here and there,realistically placed as though a tiny family actually lived here.  In fact,there is an unusual aura around this little house, a slight chill in the duskyair surrounding it, and an almost imperceptible murmuring sound of talking,laughing, crying; all echoing faintly within the miniature rooms and halls as iftiny ghosts wandered amongst them.

Objects.Name: leather-strapped journal
Objects.Description: A leather-strapped journal lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This leather bound journal is wound tightly around with a piece of rawhidecord, the pages within curling and yellowing with age.  A thin layer of dustcovers the whole book, but there is not much more to discover withoutREADing it.

Objects.Name: little red crayon
Objects.Description: A little red crayon lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This shiny wax crayon looks just like any other, a bright blood-red it hasbeen used slightly, the paper peeled half away and the glistening tip partiallyblunted.

Objects.Name: little doll blue
Objects.ShortDescription: a little doll in a blue dress
Objects.Description: A little doll, dressed in blue, lies gathering dust here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little cloth doll has had its face completely smudged away, just blacksmudges of ink smearing its features like dark tears.  Its worn limbs are raggedin places, fraying cloth barely holding together the stuffing within, andunravelling in places so that threads trail loosely.  A tiny blue dress isstitched carefully around it, offering a cheery, if somewhat faded, splash ofcolor to this sorry looking toy.

Objects.Name: children's bible book
Objects.Description: A children's bible lies open here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little book has been designed for a child to read, colored picturesdecorating the cover and liberally placed here and there amongst the pages oflarge simply-worded stories.  It is opened to a chapter on obedience, severalparagraphs highlighted with bright yellow marker pen.

Objects.Name: slightly dented billiard ball
Objects.Description: A slightly dented billiard ball has been left lying on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This polished red ball is smooth to the touch and extremely heavy.  It looksas though it was once perfectly round, but some substantial force has dented it,leaving it useless for its original purpose as part of a pool-table game.

Objects.Name: birdcage little wicker cage
Objects.Description: A little wicker birdcage hangs from a white stand.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little cage looks as if it was designed to be more ornamental thanfunctional.  Long slender bars have been carefully smoothed and covered withglossy white paint.  Inside, two perches span the width and a little metal swinghangs from the domed roof.

Objects.Name: tiny humming bird
Objects.Description: A tiny humming-bird flits rapidly about.

Objects.Name: fridge tall
Objects.Description: A tall fridge stands unobtrusively against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tall fridge is of simple design and hums gently as it performs itscontinuous cooling duty.  The smooth surfaces are undecorated and reflecteverything around in a slightly distorted way.

Objects.Name: green velvety pool table
Objects.Description: A green velvety pool table on sturdy wooden legs stands in the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large impressive pool table is in pristine condition and beautifullylaid out all ready for a game.  Hanging lights illuminate the entire velvetygreen covering, complimenting the dark earthy tones of the wooden frame.

Objects.Name: milk carton milk
Objects.Description: A carton of milk stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is just your average wax-coated cardboard milk carton.  Assorteddrawings of cows and milk jugs cover the packaging, just to make extra sure youknow what it is.

Objects.Name: shiny red apple
Objects.Description: A shiny red apple lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This perfectly round apple is deep delicious red in color and smooth to thetouch.  A little stem and leaves are still attached to it, as if it were onlyjust picked from the tree.

Objects.Name: long orange carrot
Objects.Description: A long orange carrot lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long orange vegetable is still slightly dirty as though only just pulledfrom the ground.  Spikey green leaves sprout from a rounded end, its brightorange color slightly muddened and stained.

Objects.Name: playpen childs child's pen
Objects.Description: A brightly colored child's playpen stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This bright plastic piece of furniture is actually more like a little cagethan anything else, fine mesh spanning the space between each padded bar.Various brightly colored cartoon characters have been imprinted on the inside,and a soft mat pads the floor of it.

Objects.Name: bright yellow fluffy towel
Objects.Description: A bright yellow fluffy towel lies neatly folded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This sweet citrus-smelling towel is large and vivid yellow, beautifully soft,it feels fantastic to touch and to snuggle!  This sweet citrus-smelling towel islarge and vivid yellow, beautifully soft, it looks as though it would feelfantastic to touch and to snuggle!

Objects.Name: shiny brass trumpet
Objects.Description: A shiny brass trumpet lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This brand new trumpet is made of shiny, reflective brass metal.  Three keyscontrol the pitch, and a small round mouthpiece curves and winds its way aroundinto the larger cone shaped part of the instrument that projects the...theoretically, melodic sound.

Objects.Name: child's dress shoes
Objects.Description: Some child's dress shoes lie dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These smart little shoes are obviously designed for formal occasions, butlook well used, the once polished black surfaces scuffed and beginning to wearaway.

Objects.Name: little white key
Objects.Description: A little white key is lying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny white key has been carved from aging wood and painted a brightwhite color.  Though the paint is faded and chipped in places with use, it isstill rather pretty to look at, intricate celtic carvings decorating its length.A word has been scratched into the handle, the letters P IN can be seen, thoughone letter has been worn away.

Objects.Name: bookshelf shelf tall wooden
Objects.Description: A tall wooden bookshelf stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large bookshelf is made from a very dark, smooth wood.  Rows upon rowsof shelves are provided as storing space, reaching high enough to touch theceiling of most houses.

Objects.Name: fresh baked bread
Objects.Description: Some fresh baked bread sits here, filling the air with a warm scent.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large loaf of bread has been freshly made, golden brown crispy crust andfluffy white centers steam lazily from where the loaf has been recently sliced,filling the air with a lovely baking smell.

Objects.Name: golden apple pie cinnamon
Objects.Description: The smell of apples and cinnamon waft from a golden pie.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This flaky pie is still steaming hot, cooked a delicious golden brown andsteaming with the sweet smell of sugared apple slices and cinnamon.

Objects.Name: tree large leafy pear
Objects.Description: A large leafy pear tree grows here, branches waving gently.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beautiful green tree is partially flowering, little white blossomsscattered amongst the leaves, along with the occasional golden piece of fruit.Pale branches dance quietly in the wind, the leaves hushing as though eager topreserve the silence.

Objects.Name: pear
Objects.Description: A golden pear lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This golden curvaceous fruit is ripe and overflowing with juices.  There is astrange feel to it though, an unnatural cold, and the longer it is examined theless appealing it becomes, as if it were something more sinister than what itseems.

Objects.Name: bed large wooden bunkbed
Objects.Description: A large wooden bunkbed stands against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large piece of furniture comprises of two beds, one stacked on top ofthe other and supported with four large poles.  A little ladder clings to theside, making it possible for a small child to climb into the upper bed.  Warmlooking quilts are carelessly crumpled and kicked to the ends of the beds,tangled sheets left unmade.

Objects.Name: alphabet blocks pile
Objects.Description: A pile of alphabet blocks lie scattered here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These little wooden cubes have been painted in bright colors, each carefullystamped with its own letter from the alphabet.  Used as a plaything, theselittle cubes are also highly educational, teaching children how to form, andrearrange words.

Objects.Name: milk baby bottle milk
Objects.Description: A baby bottle has been dropped on the ground, left to sour.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little plastic cylinder is topped with a rubber teat for small childrento drink from without spilling.  Colorfully decorated with pictures of cartooncharacters, it narrows at the middle, making it easier for little hands tograsp.

Objects.Name: violet flower
Objects.Description: @mA violet@g blooms in a flowerpot here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: Deep morose purple, this little flower stands alone amongst a pile offeathery green leaves that protrude from the ceramic pot.  The petals seem to bevery tiny, and hang limply as though the flower were already wilting, though ithas not yet reached its full growth.

Objects.Name: tiny insect
Objects.Description: A tiny insect lies as if dead here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little jewelled insect shimmers shades of green and blue, its dark bodyglossy and segmented.  Two sleek silver-webbed wings extend from either side ofits back, several wirey black legs curled cautiously close to its abdomen.

Objects.Name: box little black
Objects.Description: A little black box has been set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark glistening box is set with black onyx stones, the smooth reflectivesurface shadow-like and ominous as though it is not quite part of the livingworld.

Objects.Name: sword words
Objects.Description: A sword lies gathering dust here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long sword is made of dark shimmering metal, the silvery hilt is carvedinto the likeness of an open mouth from which the length of the blade protrudeslike a sharp black tongue.  Etchings here and there in the metal glow faintly,spelling out letters and words that fade too quickly to be read.

Objects.Name: swirling tunnel tunnel-like vortex
Objects.Description: A swirling tunnel-like vortex hovers here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This gaping tunnel seems to shimmer and shift continually, various colorsmelding and merging as it swirls slowly.  It seems to have no substance inreality, the gaping mouth offering only a view of utter darkness.

Objects.Name: dark brown sofa couch
Objects.Description: A dark brown sofa sits against the wall, ripped and frayed.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large sofa is a deep chocolate color, its once ample padding nowpartially strewn about through the rips in the covering fabric.  Ratherstrangely, wooden boards have been placed beneath the seat cushions, as if tostop the whole piece of furniture from collapsing.

Objects.Name: computer
Objects.Description: A computer sits on one of the desks here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This whirring machine flickers slightly as it sits ready for use.  Pieces offinished and unfinished homework can be seen partially typed on the screen.Background windows displaying various internet pages and emails.

Objects.Name: bush leafy
Objects.Description: A leafy bush grows greenly here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This short sprouting bush is covered with flowers that are just beginning tofade, bright berries sprouting here and there amongst the leaves, blossominglike tiny wounds amongst the dying flowers.

Objects.Name: cluster little red berries
Objects.ShortDescription: a little cluster of red berries
Objects.Description: A little cluster of red berries lie fallen here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These plump, juicy berries are a vibrant red color and look perfectlydelicious to eat.  The deep color pleasantly contrasts the bright green leaves,the fleshy skin taut with nectar and unblemished.

Objects.Name: bed wooden
Objects.Description: A wooden bed has been pushed against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This regular-sized single bed is made of ordinary wood, roughly nailedtogether and somewhat worn as if it has been used for many years.  The mattresstoo is in rough shape, metal coils protruding in places through tears in thefabric, filthy stuffing slowly working its way out.

Objects.Name: screwdriver
Objects.Description: A screwdriver has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simple tool has a chilled feeling to it as though touched with someevil.  The smooth glassy handle is scarlet red and transparent, a long metalshaft extending from its middle.  The silvery length ends in a pointed tip, itssleek surface slightly copper-stained as if rusted.

Objects.Name: toolbox box
Objects.Description: A toolbox sits unobtrusively off to the side.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This rusting toolbox has been painted bright red, the old paint flaking offin places to expose the sharp glistening metal.  Although the box itself iscovered in a layer of dust, the trays and tools within look regularly used.

Objects.Name: piece twine
Objects.Description: A piece of twine lies coiled up.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dirty and stained piece of a twine has a sinister feel to it, almost asif some malicious evil had embedded its presence into the fraying material.  Itlooks strong but worn, as if it has been used and reused many times for securingsomething.

Objects.Name: pair pliers
Objects.Description: A pair of pliers glint dangerously.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long sleek pair of pliers has a red rubber handle for easy gripping.The jagged inner surfaces of the pliers look vicious, extending into adangerously pointed end that would make a formidable weapon.

Objects.Name: long black skirt
Objects.Description: A long black skirt lies crumpled on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made of black, heavy fabric, this skirt looks almost more like it is wovenfrom darkness itself than any natural cloth.  It feels strange to the touch, asif saturated with time and the ghosts of memories.

Objects.Name: little pile cornflakes
Objects.Description: A little pile of cornflakes lies scattered here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This crispy yellow cereal looks reasonably safe to eat although it is not themost appealing considering it has been on the ground.  In fact little tufts ofhair and other dust fluffs are sticking all over it.

Objects.Name: shelves large wooden
Objects.Description: Large wooden shelves stand against the eastern wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These huge wooden shelves look strong and sturdy, spanning the entire lengthof the crawl-space wall, they are wide enough and well-built enough to hold allbut the largest of boxes.  A large gap beneath them leaves room for tallerobjects and pieces of small furniture.

Objects.Name: bathtub tub bath
Objects.Description: A bathtub sits against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This smooth tub has a dark ring of grime staining much of the formerly whitesurface.  Buildups of mildew and minerals are caked around the taps and plug,leaving it almost impossible to drain as evidenced by the slight pooling ofdirty water.

Objects.Name: bed wooden
Objects.Description: A wooden bed has been pushed against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This single bed is made of ordinary wood that is smeared all over withglowing blue fingerprints.  Splashes of the phosphorescent stuff glow ominouslyfrom the blankets and sheets, coating the protruding metal coils, and specklingthe rest of the framework.

Objects.Name: pair eyes
Objects.Description: A pair of eyes lie unblinking on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These large, open eyes are bright blue in color, and slide slowly about asif still attached to some living creature.  Unblinking and strangely piercing,they seem to perceive things beyond the normal realm.

Objects.Name: cabinet broken mirror
Objects.Description: A mirror cabinet hangs on the wall, the glass cracked and broken.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This carved wooden cabinet has been inlaid with a pane of reflective glass,once an unblemished mirror but now cracked and splintered in many places, thesilver lines spanning the surface of the mirror like crystal spider webs.

Objects.Name: sharp knife
Objects.Description: A sharp knife lies glinting cruelly on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long, frightful looking blade is razor-sharp and already rust-coloredwith a taste of blood.  The silvery, shiny metal is otherwise perfectlypolished; beautiful as well as lethal.

Objects.Name: bloody dress
Objects.Description: A bloody dress lies dumped in a heap.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A faded blue color, the vague pattern of flowers can be seen on the parts ofthe fabric that are not worn away.  Much of it has been utterly spoiled however,angry splashes of red blood soaking the material, making it rust-colored andgruesomely sticky.

Objects.Name: little black key
Objects.Description: A little black key lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny black key has been carved from naturally dark wood that has thenbeen stained a deep oil black.  Though the key is somewhat old and damaged, itstill looks usable, angry slashes carved apparently deliberately into itslength.  A word has been crudely etched into the handle, the letters S E can beseen, though one has been worn away.

Objects.Name: corpse red trout
Objects.ShortDescription: the corpse of the red trout
Objects.Description: The corpse of the red trout is lying here.

Objects.Name: corpse taildove
Objects.Description: The corpse of the taildove is lying here.

Objects.Name: corpse vile toad
Objects.ShortDescription: the corpse of the vile toad
Objects.Description: The corpse of the vile toad is lying here.

Objects.Name: ana pearl darkly beautiful
Objects.Description: A darkly beautiful pearl glints from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Perfectly smooth and round, this pearl is black as the darkest depths of anocean.  A strong chill emanates from it, the feel of pure evil and sorrow.Like an unblinking, unfeeling eye, it looks out on the world with the watchfulgaze of a predator.

Objects.Name: hotdog
Objects.Description: A hotdog lies gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Drops of fat glisten along the long roll of meat like tears, a thin rivuletof ketchup seeping scarlet from the soft bread that has been torn in two toaccomodate it.  There is a dark feel to it, as though it is of evil origin andimparts only pain instead of nourishment.

Objects.Name: pines
Objects.Description: Pines stand stiffly against the breeze.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Dark and menacing, these tall trees are armed with several stiff branches ofneedle-like spines.  The black roots can be seen penetrating far into theground, repulsively twitching like the legs of a splayed spider.

Objects.Name: black egg
Objects.Description: A black egg lies forgotten on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Smoothly polished and dark like obsydian, this oval egg is cold to the touchas if carved from marble.  A strange pulsing vibrates through it however, as ifsome unseen heart were beating within.

Objects.Name: serpent's tongue
Objects.Description: The severed tongue of a serpent has been left to rot.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Deep blood-red, this long tongue coils around in a spiral, its forked endslightly lifted and bent as if it were cut in the very process of speaking.  Anaura of charisma and deceit surrounds it, the inheritance of its serpent owner.

Objects.Name: wine glass red wine
Objects.Description: A glass of deep red wine stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long stemmed glass has a delicate oval body, sparkling when any lighthits it and illuminating the ruby wine within.  Swirling gently and ominously,it seems almost as if the blood red liquid moves of its own accord.

Objects.Name: dark cluster burning trees raging fire pines
Objects.Description: A dark cluster of pines is ablaze with raging fire.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: dark cluster burning trees raging fire pines
Objects.ExtraDescription: The black branches of trees can be seen grasping through the fire likedesperate charcoal fingers.  Ash swirls relentlessly around the doomed pines,mixing with the smoke to create an impenetrable cloud of darkness.

Objects.Name: black page
Objects.Description: A black page lies gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark page looks as though it is the remnants of some burned tree, thecharred bark still warm to the touch as if with some magic.  Most strangely ofall, charcoal words fade in and out of existance with a whispering, someterrible story trying to tell itself.

Objects.Name: flickering candle
Objects.Description: A flickering candle casts long shadows about itself.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a regular candle made from soft white wax and fixed into a delicatebronze holder.  The flame atop it blazes passionately, and although the heatradiating from it is immense, the wax does not seem to be melting.

Objects.Name: book shadows dark
Objects.Description: @DA dark book lies amongst the shadows.@g
Objects.ExtraDescription: This thick shadowy book is made from the crispy bark of some fire-blackenedtree.  It shimmers slightly as though from a ghost realm, and strange charcoalwords fade in and out of existance, too dark to read.

Objects.Name: corpse
Objects.ShortDescription: the corpse of a ghostly girl
Objects.Description: The corpse of a ghostly girl is lying here.

Objects.Name: green mound earth little
Objects.ShortDescription: a little green mound of earth
Objects.Description: A little green mound of earth marks a burial spot.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This freshly piled mound of earth and grass seems to mark a place of burial.Its length and width only big enough to accomodate the size of a child.

Objects.Name: fiery bloodstone amulet
Objects.Description: A fiery amulet lies flickering on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A smooth round bloodstone shimmers strangely as it is examined, ripples ofdark red and fiery light dancing across its surface, reflecting in the goldclasp that spirals around it.  Beautiful and mysterious, the magic imbued inthis gem is that of enhancing the wearer's concentration, allowing them to'focus' and retreat into a realm of inner safety, choosing to 'awaken' at will.

Objects.Name: little silver ring
Objects.Description: A little silver ring lies gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate little ring is made from beautiful untarnished silver, afragile looking band meets in a v-shape, the silver carefully fashioned into theshape of a tiny smooth heart.

Objects.Name: small embroidery
Objects.Description: A small embroidery has been left crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A little wooden loop has been fastened around a square piece of fabric,several tiny colored stiches making up an embroidered likeness of a collie dog,a few loose and untidy threads testifying to the amateur skill of the artist.

Objects.Name: lego bricks
Objects.Description: Some lego bricks lie abandoned.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These tiny plastic bricks are meant to be fastened together to build varioussorts of objects.  A popular kind of child's toy, these have been well used,tiny grimy fingerprint marks smudging the bright colorful surfaces.

Objects.Name: box cornflakes
Objects.Description: A box of cornflakes lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made of white cardboard, this box has the trademark logo of cornflakes on thefront, a bright green cartoon rooster hovering over a photographed bowl ofyellow cripsy cereal.

Objects.Name: box kraft cheese macaroni
Objects.ShortDescription: a box of kraft macaroni and cheese
Objects.Description: A box of kraft macaroni and cheese lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: About the size of a video tape, this blue cardboard box holds a packet ofcheese powder and dried macaroni noodles, ready for cooking up a fast and easydinner.
